# Grant or Reject Approval

# Description

Approve or reject requests.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Approval ID - The ID for the approval. This field supports String type input.
* Action - Select the action to be performed from the drop-down list: Approve or Reject.
* Reason - Provide the reason for the above action. This field supports String type input.





* Approvals - Automatically generated output variable.
* Status - The current status of the approval process. Automatically generated output variable.
